opis: House size 400m2, on a plot of land size 1000m2. It consists of a basement on the ground floor, first/mezzanine floor and first/second floor, a long garage with an entrance from the street and a large garage in the yard for 2 cars. In the basement/ground floor, immediately to the right of the stairs, there are 2 rooms that serve as a storage room/boiler room, etc. On the first floor/ground floor there is an entrance, hallway, toilet, kitchen, dining room, spacious living room with access to the garden and pantry. On the first floor there is a sleeping area with 4 bedrooms and a bathroom, one of which is large/parents' with its own large bathroom (jacuzzi bathtub) and walk-in closet, from 2 rooms you can go out to a long balcony, which goes along the house. In the garden there is a covered barbecue area with a "summer kitchen", toilet and stairs to the upper garden where the orchard is located. Agency In-between Ltd. for mediation services charges from the tenant, upon the signing of the Lease Agreement, agency fee in the amount of 1 MONTHLY RENT . Kuća veličine 400m2, na zemljištu veličine 1000m2. Sastoji se od podruma koji je u prizemlju, prvog/polukata kata i prvog/drugog kata, dugačka garaža s ulazom s ulice i velika garaža u dvorištu za 2 automobila. U suterenu/prizemlju , odmah desno kod stepenica smještene su 2 prostorije, koje služe kao ostava/kotlovnica i sl. Na katu/prizemlju se nalazi ulaz, hodnik, wc, kuhinja, blagavaonia, prostrani dnevni boravak s izlazom u vrt i špajza. Na katu je spavaći dio s 4 spavaće sobe i kupaonicom od kojih je jedna velika/roditeljska s vlastitom velikom kupaonicom (jacuzzi kada) i walk in ormarom, iz 2 sobe se može izaći na dugački balkon, koji ide uz kuću. U vrtu se nalazi natkriveni dio za roštilj s „ljetnom kuhinjom“, wc-om i stepenicama za gornji vrt gdje se nalazi voćnjak. Agencija In-between d.o.o za uslugu posredovanja naplaćuje od najmoprimca, po potpisu Ugovora o najmu, posredničku naknadu u iznosu 1 ugovorene mjesečne najamnine.
Troškovi: Iznos agencijske provizije koju plaća najmoprimac: 3000 EUR
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Iblerov trg 9, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
